detail_desc: Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover top, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt. Lined at the front.
Set with a top and leggings in printed cotton jersey. Top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in soft pile with a detachable, jersey-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Cotton jersey lining.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a decorative bow on the shaft. Unlined.
Round-necked blouse in a patterned viscose weave with buttons down the back, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a chest pocket, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length, jacquard weave dress in softly draping viscose with a sheen. V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs, and glass-bead and sparkly-stone decorations around the neckline and cuffs. Slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with metal pendants. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and soft brushed inside.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Double-layered hat in ribbed cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
Wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a lightweight Tencel™ lyocell weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide cotton jersey panel at the waist for optimum fit.
Short, wide T-shirt with a motif on the front, a ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Bracelet in soft faux fur with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details at one end. Size 3.5x17 cm.
Glittery, lined bikini top with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with a heart-shaped metal decoration. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and decorative belt with a metal D-ring at the front.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a matching bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket and buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Adjustable bow tie with a plastic fastener.

Short dress in crinkled chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and skirt with multi-layered flounces at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a wide rib-knit polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Stocking stitched back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a roll-edge neckline, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and straight, gently tapered legs.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Leggings in sturdy, jacquard-patterned, seamless fabric. High waist with a ribbed waistband.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Small embroidered detail on the chest, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Coat in a woven wool blend with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, wide, rounded sleeves and a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Blouse in an airy weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a frill-trimmed, ribbed turtleneck, long sleeves with a ribbed flounce at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Handbag in imitation patent leather with a print motif. Zip and glittery handles at the top and a decorative imitation leather pendant on one handle. Lined. Size 10x14x19 cm.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.

Calf-length coat in a quilted weave designed for outdoor activity. Ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams for safe storage of valuables. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a rounded hem for a better fit when moving. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Tube scarf in thermal fleece. Length 19 cm at the back and 28 cm at the front.
Short jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in transparent mesh with a wide, gathered flounce at the hem.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in soft, stretch cotton twill with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, back pockets and a fake fly.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in Italian wool with pleats, a zip fly with a button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Twill trousers in a cotton blend with a high paper bag waist, zip fly with a concealed press-stud, side pockets and back pockets. Elastic on the inside, a detachable tie belt with a plastic fastener at the waist and wide, straight legs with creases.
Small bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Size 5x12.5x19 cm.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Width of brim approx. 6 cm.
Metal earrings with pendants decorated with faceted sparkly stones and flowers in plastic. Length approx. 12 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
V-neck dress in woven fabric with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a tapered bodice, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Knee-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a deep, gathered neckline. Gathered seam at the waist and in the skirt for added width. Unlined.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit in a straight cut at the top with a silicone trim. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.

prod_name: Buzz padded soft bra back det
detail_desc: Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and front fastening.
Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist and zip at the front. Side and back pockets and ankle-length, flared legs.

Calf-length shirt dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, press-studs down the front and a button band with a decorative tab at the top. Large patch front pockets and extra-long wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats at the top, belt loops with a press-stud, and a detachable tie belt with elastication in the middle. Slit at the back.
Short, halterneck top in jersey crêpe with wide flounces at the sides and back.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip at the back.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short-sleeved jersey nightdress with a print motif on the front.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short-sleeved playsuit in Tencel™ lyocell denim with notch lapels, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Sewn-in tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top with a sewn-in inner top for easier nursing access. Short, wide sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
